item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Anna Liffey's

http://annaliffeys.com/

Anna Liffey's is a charming old Irish Pub in downtown New Haven.  It's a great place for good pub food and friends. Located on Whitney Avenue, just after it changes over from Church Street, with a big old Irish flag out front.  Don't be deceived if you don't see anyone in the window, a lot of the time the fun is in the downstairs bar which is open just about all the time.

No particular specials this time, just whatever Liffey's decides to run on the day.

If you are only a "Maybe" for Happy Hour Type Events, please put this in your RSVP Comment.

HOST: Jason (cell # in RSVP) AJ will take over Hosting since Jason is sick.  You can try to contact AJ by cell at 315-345-9348.

You can call, but texting may be better as cell phone reception inside Anna Liffey's is often poor.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for/call/text the event "host". We're also usually one of the largest groups at the bar on a Monday.
item.name: Mon 10/8 - Happy Hour - Anna Liffey's
